name: Cobra Castle
description:
Climb up the tower by eating mice and try to rack up a high score!

Use the Arrow Keys or WASD to move around!

Gold Mice keep escaping your grasp? Try holding down Spacebar to sprint!

Every alternating floor will be a Labyrinth you have to escape! Try running straight for the door, or maybe try to grab some bonus mice on the way for extra points!
